question:
The Mahaparivartan Diwas was observed on December 6th throughout the country. In this context, consider the following statements:
  1. It marks the birth anniversary of Dr. Ambedkar.
  2. Mahaparinibbana Sutta refers to the birth of Lord Buddha.
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Statement 1 is incorrect: Mahaparinirvan Diwas marks the death anniversary of Dr B R Ambedkar. Ambedkar is considered as the Father of the Indian Constitution. He was the chief architect of the constitutional text. He is known for his advocacy of upliftment of the drown-trodden and the importance of rights. Statement 2 is incorrect: Mahaprinibbana Sutta refers to the death of Lord Buddha when he was 80 years old. Parinirvana refers to nirvana after death- an important principle in Buddhism. The death anniversary is considered a parinirvana by Ambedkerâ€™s followers in recognition of his faith. Also he is considered as a Buddhist guru by his followers.
